Query: how to start a video from the terminal?

Answers.MP Summary: download videos from youtube.com or other video platforms
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Download a video or playlist at a specific quality
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_469845: how to play video downloaded from terminal
au_401550: How can i download youtube videos one after another automatically from terminal
au_486297: How to select video quality from youtube-dl?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_486297: youtube-dl 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -F 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f 22 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f best 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f 'bestvideo[ext=mp4]+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/bestvideo+bestaudio' --merge-output-format mp4 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

Explanations about Options.--merge-output-format:
If a merge is required (e.g. bestvideo+bestaudio), output to given container
 format. One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv. Ignored if no merge is required

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Convert frames from a video or GIF into individual numbered images
Top-3 Similar Questions: so_56088966: Quickly extract multiple frames from multiple videos
au_376012: ffmpeg how to output images from a video
ul_647645: How to extract every 10th frame from a video?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_647645: ffmpeg -i out1.avi -r 0.1 -f image2 image-%3d.jpeg

ffmpeg -i out1.mp4 -vf "select=not(mod(n\,10))" -vsync vfr image_%03d.jpg

Explanations about Options.-ss:
When used as an input option (before "-i"), seeks in this input file to position. Note
 that in most formats it is not possible to seek exactly, so ffmpeg will seek to the
 closest seek point before position. When transcoding and -accurate_seek is enabled
 (the default), this extra segment between the seek point and position will be decoded
 and discarded. When doing stream copy or when -noaccurate_seek is used, it will be
 preserved.
Explanations about Options.-t:
When used as an input option (before "-i"), limit the duration of data read from the
 input file.
Explanations about Options.-vf: Create the filtergraph specified by filtergraph and use it to filter the stream.
Explanations about Options.-vsync:
Video sync method. For compatibility reasons old values can be specified as numbers.
 Newly added values will have to be specified as strings always.
Explanations about Options.-loglevel: Set logging level and flags used by the library.
Explanations about Options.-n:
Do not overwrite output files, and exit immediately if a specified output file already
 exists.

Answers.MP Summary: screen manager with VT100/ANSI terminal emulation
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1147535: Start the first terminal from tmux
so_13785244: Start GDB from shell script
Top-3 Scripts:
so_13785244: #!/bin/bash
screen -S gdb_program gdb /path/to/program <<EOF
handle SIGPIPE nostop noprint pass
EOF

Explanations about Options.-S:
When creating a new session, this option can be used to specify a meaningful name for
 the session. This name identifies the session for "screen -list" and "screen -r"
 actions. It substitutes the default [tty.host] suffix.
